
out = []
sofar = -999999;
inp = []
cases = int(raw_input())

for i in xrange(cases):
        inp.append(int(raw_input()))

for num in inp:
        temp = num
#       print ("a * b = %d * %d = %d") % (a,b,(a*b))
        while True:
                numString = str(temp)
                middle = len(numString) / 2
                if((len(numString) % 2) !=0):
                        front = numString[:middle+1]
                else:
                        front = numString[:middle]
                back = numString[middle:]
                back = back[::-1]
                if(front == back):
                        out.append(temp)
                        break
                #sofar = max(sofar,(a*b))
                else:
                        temp += 1

print "\n".join(map(str,out))
